title: Black camera lines
content: So I want to know what night mode looks like so I'm trying to use it and I have it downloaded and everything however when I'm in my room and it's pretty dark and I just wanted to test it out but there's a lot of black lines around the camera where I'm trying to take a picture and it's nowhere near as dark as the pictures that Google has posted on their website as you can see in the picture below it's not as crisp as one might think
